title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 26 December 2012 - XWiki
content:
<tekzilla> has quit  
03:46 <tekzilla> has joined #xwiki  
04:00 <sdumitriu> has quit  
06:35 <tdelafosse> has joined #xwiki  
09:13 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
09:25 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
10:05 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
10:40 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:49 <vmassol> has quit  
10:52 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
10:53 <vmassol> good morning  
10:54 <vmassol> going to start preparing the 4.4RC1 release  
11:36 <mflorea> has quit  
11:51 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
11:57 <sdumitriu> vmassol: Are you releasing from master or the xwiki-platform-4.4-milestone-1 branch?  
11:57 <vmassol> master  
11:57 <vmassol> i'm releasing 4.4RC1  
11:57 <vmassol> ah you just committed sometihng  
11:58 <vmassol> hope it didn't break anything :)  
11:58 <sdumitriu> Nope, it's minor  
11:58 <sdumitriu> Saw you postponing it, and the bug was obvious  
12:00 <vmassol> ok  
12:05 <vmassol> starting build  
12:44 <vmassol> has quit  
13:10 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
13:19 <mrvanes> has joined #xwiki  
13:20 <vmassol> has quit  
13:30 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
13:32 <vmassol> restarting release  
14:10 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
14:14 <vmassol> sdumitriu: I have a problem with the release script  
14:15 <vmassol> https://gist.github.com/4380327  
14:15 <vmassol> any idea?  
14:15 <vmassol> I tried twice  
14:27 <vmassol> sdumitriu: it happens when I type: git tag -s -f -m "Tagging xwiki-commons-4.4-rc-1" xwiki-commons-4.4-rc-1
